thread.title: Celebrity Birthday: Tiwa Savage, Fathia Balogun are a year older
thread.title_full: Celebrity Birthday: Tiwa Savage, Fathia Balogun are a year older

author: Vwovwe Egbo
title: Celebrity Birthday: Tiwa Savage, Fathia Balogun are a year older
text:
Tweet Tiwa Savage turns 37-years-old today, Sunday, February 5, 2017 and reportedly has plans for a bash tonight. LIB reports that the pop singer who is currently in London will have a special birthday party at the "Tunnel Night Club. 
Tiwa Savage as a guest on IK Osakioduwa's TV show. (instagram) The Mavin Records/ROC Nation act is unarguably Nigeria’s biggest female singer. Tiwa Savage who is married to her estranged husband, Tunji ‘Tee Billz’ Balogun , welcomed a baby boy, Jamil Balogun , on July 22, 2015.
